website_summaries.verdict: A retractable hose that contracts to one-third its fully-extended size and includes a nozzle.
pros: Comes with a sprayer that works great
Brass fittings are good quality and last a long time
Saves space when not in use
cons: This hose shrinks up when not in use, which makes it not user friendly for keeping extended to water a garden or other area of the yard

customer_reviews.title: Worthless.
customer_reviews.text: Disintegrated a month after first use. Inner liner disconnected from sprinkler at hose end and entire hose collapsed. Since I bought it in winter for spring use the return window had closed.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Their 2017 version failed. Now 2019 "improved" version had to be returned.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 2017 GrowGreen hose for my 85-year-old mother. Despite gentle care, it only lasted her 2 years before it sprung a leak. I thought the 2019 "improved" version might be, you know... improved. Instead, it arrived with defective threads. I've requested the defective 2019 version be replaced. We'll see if the third time's the charm OR if these are simply a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Great Hose
customer_reviews.text: This hose is great. I like the connectors and the nozzle that comes with it. I wish it would come with a little hook holder so it doesn't have to lay on the ground when not in use. We have bought another brand before that had this and it instantly made it better. Overall the hose is excellent and works great!
customer_reviews.author: LKP Tackett

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Made Product - BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: The hose developed a hole while water was running through it, instead of leaking the hose popped and shot water everywhere and soaked just about everything in my garage before I could even shut the water off. I would not recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 weeks!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I always wanted a long expandable hose for our gardens. We purchase the GreenGrow 100ft expandable hose. We loved it's flexibility and weight. It was easy to handle. Slight leak where the sprayer attached to the hose, but alittle Teflon tape fixed the problem. After 3 weeks the hose collapsed somewhere and didn't allow the water to pass through. Disappointing! Amazon was great, went to ship it back, and amazon said to just bring it to a the UPS store and they will package it up for you and return it. They sent a barcode to my phone and that's all I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Pete S.

customer_reviews.title: sprung leaks , but great customer service and happy now!
customer_reviews.text: I was initially pleased with the weight of this hose. I purchased it in mid June of this year. Now, in September, I'm putting my garden equipment away and doing some last watering, I discovered that it was leaking in many places. I wrote the company,but saw on their website that they had a 30 day window for refund. I got a really nice response from the company and there are sending me a replacement. So while I was upset about the vulnerability of the hose, I look forward to trying a new one and hopefully avoiding the leaks. These things happen and when the company is reponsive, you can't ask for more than that. That is excellent service.
customer_reviews.author: esp

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a year use maybe 10 times
customer_reviews.text: Used to add water to pool and to wash down pool area. After a year broke about 12 feet from the head. Yes its light. Yes its easy to move around and doesn't tangle. No it won't last for any meaningful amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Chris W

customer_reviews.title: Got A Hole After Only a Few Uses
customer_reviews.text: I use this hose only to water plants bordering the lawn. Got a hole on the sixth use. I only pull it over the lawn, so nothing it could snag on. Be careful with the "free returns" as in my case there was less than a month from receiving the hose to when the return window closed, so I am stuck with an expensive worthless hose.
customer_reviews.author: Tereerose

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Great company.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second (and now third) hose from this company. They are great nice brass fittings and have really good flow. My first 100ft has a small hole in it one the first use. Not sure if a manufacturing problem or a shipping problem. There was no damage to the exterior of the hose. Disappointing to say the least as my first one (50ft) was awesome and these aren’t cheap. Well contacted the company and they had me a new one in three business days and with no questions asked. It was great. Nice to see a company that stands behind their products. A+ service and a great product.
customer_reviews.author: JBrookie

customer_reviews.title: Two months in and so far so good!!
customer_reviews.text: Two months in, and so far so good! I am very glad that they seem to have worked out the kinks and failures of these hoses because they make life so much easier. No more lugging around enormous tubes of water, and no more untangling great tubes of water!! It can get a little tangled when it fills with water, but it’s so much lighter than my old hose, that it really isn’t a big problem. I’m about to order another GrowGreen hose for the front of our house. Thanks for saving my aching back!!
customer_reviews.author: FionaM

customer_reviews.title: Update: Bulges and leaks after 2 months of use. Orig: So far I love it
customer_reviews.text: Update: After 2 months of use, it now has a big bulge near the connection and lots of little leaks. The on/off knob never did work and in fact doesn't turn or do anything. I do not recommend. Orig: I bought the 100' length, had it about 2 weeks and so far love it. So much lighter than a traditional hose, easier to drag across the lawn and around all my plants. I use it with a wand so it doesn't shrink back up by itself unless I take the wand off, but it is easy to drag back to the faucet and coil up manually.
customer_reviews.author: StarWomyn

customer_reviews.title: So easy to manage
customer_reviews.text: I needed a long hose, but I struggle with the heavy ones, and winding them up after use is even more of a struggle. This hose checks all the boxes for convenience, weight, and storage. It comes pre-fitted with hose washers for the included nozzle and faucet connection. The nozzle has multiple settings for various uses. Great value! I have another short one for the front yard. It was purchased in 2019 and that one still looks new. I did store it in the basement over the winter.
customer_reviews.author: MicheleB

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Well I guess I was warned. Product was good for just under two months and now it has multiople pin sized holes in it. As the hose is stretched and contracts I think the material its made out of makes it inevitable that this will happen. I am not rough on my hoses, they sit outside on my lawn and I use to water and hose down patio and pool deck. Very dissapointed and will be looking for a replacement of another brand
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: The hose was great for two months before it sprung its first leak. I’d probably used it five times by then. I used it a couple more times before it sprung a massive leak, rendering it useless. The search for a hose that lasts continues 😔
customer_reviews.author: Philip McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Hose busted within 8 months.
customer_reviews.text: I had this hose to water plants in my yard. I used it maybe a dozen times last fall. I turned it on a couple weeks ago and it had busted a hole about 2 feet from the nozzle. It is no longer usable. I purchased this because of the lifetime durability. I paid almost $60 and am VERY upset. I left a message with the seller but no response. I would appreciate a resolution. Thank you, Jane
customer_reviews.author: Jane Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Love this hose!
customer_reviews.text: I know people have complained about this hose not lasting long, but I love mine!! So easy to use, move around the garden with, and coils up quickly. I hate struggling with a big bulky hose when I am trying to access several different areas of my yard. Will always have one of these on hand even though I only get a few years out of them. You definitely have to put it away in the winter to help it last longer.
customer_reviews.author: MNTMAMA

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and no kinks!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I love this hose! It is easy to maneuver around the yard. It's very lightweight and does not kink. When I am done watering, I spray the remaining water and the hose contracts. I can't believe how much easier it is with this hose and how much time I save by not having to lug the old, heavy hose around. I am a much happier person because I also no longer have the frustration of constantly trying to unkink the old hose. I am very pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: KMKTigger

customer_reviews.title: Mutch sturdier than my last hose
customer_reviews.text: I just got this hose so don't know how well it will last. Very pleased that it is much sturdier than my last hose of this type. Love the bright green color to easily find it. Easy to put on hose reel. I bought 100 ft. and it works great. Hasn't kinked and easy to drag to far ends of property. Bought two other hoses from Amazon and they failed. Hope the third one is the charm.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Sanfilippo

customer_reviews.title: Great flexibility, but at the cost of less water pressure / volume
customer_reviews.text: I love this hose for certain circumstances, but NOT for others. If you need a maneuverable hose that stores compact and easily, and want to use it to hand water flowers or fill up a bucket, it’s great. If you want it to move a lot of water or run a sprinkler, it’s not great for that. The smaller diameter interior hose doesn’t carry nearly as much water as a traditional hose. This keeps it flexible, but isn’t going to be powerful enough to give you a strong jet of water. It won’t have the volume to run your sprinkler as well as a normal hose.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Grossman

customer_reviews.title: Great hose!
customer_reviews.text: So I’ve heard great things about these hoses, but never have seen it in action. When the box arrived I was shocked at the weight! Opened it up and connected with ease, then watched it grow and grow and grow!! So lightweight and easy to move around. Seems pretty durable! UPDATE: my hose got tangled with the rose bush and the thorns popped it! I contacted the seller and they immediately sent out a replacement:) very good customer service. I’m now more careful with it around sharper objects.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Hose leaked when received
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I cannot give a good review as I was not able to even use the hose as It was shipped in a plastic mailer bag with multiple small holes so had leaks when connected so thrown out wasted money :( it looked well made for this type of hose but pretty expensive after connected and wet could not repack to return
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Angel

customer_reviews.title: Great product ! I really really like it!
customer_reviews.text: I can't really say too much yet. I bought it as a gift, but I plan to buy one for myself and then I will really be able to leave a review that is meaningful. My Aunt really seemed to like it and I will know more at a later date. As for now I would give it a thumbs up. This is the best I can do for now. ( My Aunt was thrilled with her gift and I hope that it helps her in her watering of her plants and trees.) I have talked to the person that got this as a gift and she said that it is awesome. I have yet to use mine.
customer_reviews.author: Tesie

customer_reviews.title: Durable and light weight
customer_reviews.text: Bought this second order for the wife. I was very pleased with our first purchase and bought this second longer hose for the front lawn. We have automated sprinkler's but my wife loves to use the hose on Watering shrubs, flowers and the lawn. This makes it so easy to handle and replaced a very long and bulky hose. Can I get a ThankYou!
customer_reviews.author: Ed Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I have had the hose less than 4 months and it is leaking. As I recall it was sold with a "life time warranty" but Amazon is no help all the Website now says is " Please contact the seller directly for warranty information for this product. You may also be able to find warranty information on the manufacturer’s website" with no link to either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: I first bought a 50 ft length to reach the end of my garden. I like it so well, I am replacing my entire watering hose with this light, easy-to-handle GrowGreen hose. I recommend this hose to everyone. It takes up less storage area than regular hoses and it is so light to carry. It is easy to roll onto and off the reel.
customer_reviews.author: hande64

customer_reviews.title: Happy with 100 feet
customer_reviews.text: We just got this and so far the hose is terrific! It expands quickly and easily. when you turn off the water, there is a lot of water left in the hose, so I just keep pressing the nozzle and as the water is released, the hose shrinks. Seems to work really well! Since we have only used it twice, I can't say anything about the durability. The nozzle is good, too, because it has the various kinds of spray labeled, so you don't have to go through every variation till you find the one you want. So far, it's terrific!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi Lane

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Hose
customer_reviews.text: This is a poor quality hose. We have several similar hoses that are different brands but have never experienced the same as we have had here. It sprang a leak in less than three months of very limited usage. It not only leaked, but somehow developed a larger tear making it completely useless. It is clear that this is just a poorly manufactured hose that will be destined to fail if you purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: DGRG54

customer_reviews.title: King of kinks
customer_reviews.text: This hose kinks easier than a pinched soda straw. Drives me NUTS! Also if you want pressure this hose destroys pressure. Get a dribble out of the end. Back to my old rubber hose.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Beware the ‘Amazon’s choice’ / good reviews this has received. No idea how that’s legit and possible. Complete useless junk. A friend told me this was good. I bought 5 Within 2 weeks they’d all sprung leaks. Then she explained - you can’t stretch it too much and you need to turn the water off when done and drain it. Maybe it’d be ok if the manufacturer gave those caveats and said this is a gentle product for light use. $250 down the drain Buy this only if you like burning money.
customer_reviews.author: A reader

customer_reviews.title: 3 hoses, all have holes in first 2-3 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of the 100-for houses to make watering the plants around our 75-foot long house easier and loved it!! It was so light weight and easy to move around, just great. So I bought 2 more. Now, less than 3 months after I night the first one, all 3 have holes, and not just pin-prick holes. One hose is so bad it's useless. We're gonna try to keep watching the others add long as we can, but from what we've experienced so far, I don't think that's gonna be long.
customer_reviews.author: GMD

customer_reviews.title: CAUTION - DOESN'T LAST LOING
customer_reviews.text: I lost $60 on this hose. Used it a few times and it has three leaks and I am unable to return it. These are a good idea but simply poorly designed or poorly built. Amazon will not allow returns or exchanges and it will rupture or leak soon after. NOT RECOMMENDED!!!
customer_reviews.author: B-House

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding customer serice
customer_reviews.text: I love these hoses. I have purchased 4 hoses from this supplier. One hose failed. The vender immediately contacted me regarding the defective hose, and replaced it no charge with second day shipping. Sometimes it’s not the product but the outstanding Customer service that makes the difference. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Young

customer_reviews.title: Quality issues
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in July 2019. After a season of use the hose developed a leak at the fitting where it attaches to the hydrant. I contacted the company and a no hassle replacement was sent in spring 2020. Now it is September and the hose has developed a leak in the same exact place. I am in the process of attempting to obtain a replacement for the replacement. Not sure if they well replace a second time. It would appear there is a manufacturing or quality problem with the hose since it has failed in the same place on two occasions. I would not recommend this based on my experience Easy to use. Very durable and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: k11ash

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: The year isn't over yet, but so far this thing is holding up like a champ. It's already outlasted a similar hose that sprung a leak in about 2.5 months. Based on performance thus far I really dont expect any issues. Will update if time proves me wrong.
customer_reviews.author: . Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Best garden hose ever!
customer_reviews.text: We finally had to replace one of these we bought three years ago, the other is still going strong by the way. These are the best, most well made and functional garden hoses we’ve ever owned and I’ve tried them all! I will only use these from now on and people who have helped in our yard have asked where I got them because they were going to be getting them too and they did. I don’t mind watering someone else’s garden when they’re away, especially when they have these hoses now too.
customer_reviews.author: jkbwl

customer_reviews.title: Leaking after 3.5mo
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hose in June 2020. It started leaking this past week (Late September) - less than 4 months after purchase. It has been treated with care so this is puzzling/disappointing. I will contact the seller and see what their response is.
customer_reviews.author: L F

customer_reviews.title: 100 feet of lightweight easily moveable hose
customer_reviews.text: i purchased the 2 hoses to be able to water my outdoor plants with ease. i have a plastic container for each and when i am done using them the hose is easily put back it's container. the hoses are extremely lightweight and easily maneuvered to where you want to use them even though they are very long at 100 feet each.
customer_reviews.author: JOS

customer_reviews.title: Great hose (until it sprung a leak). Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: This hose lasted 2 months then sprung a major leak in the body of the hose. Until then, I loved this hose. Lightweight, easy to use, no hose reel needed. Called the manufacturer and they said they'd send a new hose right away. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: amy m.

customer_reviews.title: Light weight hose
customer_reviews.text: This 100 foot hose is ideal for me I have to take it to the full extent to water some of my flowers and plants. it’s easy to move around and shrinks back up into a very small space. So far so good I cannot speak to durability as I’ve only had it for a month.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Well made, I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I like the hose. It is really nice and seems to be well made. It came with two extra gaskets that I have not used. I did have a bit of a surprise when I turned it off. The pressure caused water to spew out at the faucet. No real problem just a surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Don Rankin

customer_reviews.title: Great hose! But nozzle broke
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised how small and light this 100 foot hose is. I can reach most of my very large yard with this hose, and it shrinks up to smaller than my old hose that wasn't able to reach the same areas. I really like the nozzle that came with it, and I haven't had any issues yet. Update: the nozzle broke.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Save your purchase and registration info
customer_reviews.text: I loved this garden hose but unfortunately it snagged on my forsythia bush and was sliced by the impact. I remember registering this purchase when I first bought it but don’t know how to return it for a refund. It has a 2 year warrantee, I think. Still I would buy it again and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: G. Metro

customer_reviews.title: The original broke within a few months, and the replacement in a week
customer_reviews.text: very bad, customer service is great, he sent me a replacement when it broke a few months after buying it, the bad thing that the replacement broke a week of use, I used it to water the Lawn, no hard work. But it broke.
customer_reviews.author: E. R.

customer_reviews.title: durable
customer_reviews.text: I love this hose - its durable - lightweight and perfect for condo living. I do not have an outside hose hookup and run this hose from my kitchen to outside for plan watering. It works perfect. So happy I am not lugging buckets of water anymore. Love this hose.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Grzyb

customer_reviews.title: Truly Easy to Drag Out & Then Put Away
customer_reviews.text: It really is light weight. I'm tired of wrangling stiff hoses out to the back if the yard, where I've planted bushes, and then dragging them back towards the house to be put away. Doesn't look as if there will be kinks or python-like twists to this hose. A winner.
customer_reviews.author: Janis Ann

customer_reviews.title: After2 months hose sprung leak
customer_reviews.text: The hose and nozzle itself are great, but mine sprung a leak in the hose after only 2 months. The part that is leaking remains on the wall mounted hose holder and has never touched the ground. I wish this hose would have lasted 2 years rather than 2 months. I bought another one but shorter recently for another part of the property. Hoping that one lasts and I can somehow get a replacement free of charge for the one that is clearly defective and failed.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie V

customer_reviews.title: Light Weight Hose lives up to its claims
customer_reviews.text: Other friends have purchased the flexible hose. The 4 star is based upon the hose showing a loose fibers that, like on a shirt or sweater, could unravel in time. Other friends have commented on this condition. It does get caught on plant bed corners and this may be the source of the loosening or snagging of the threads. It does live up to portability and weigh claims. Better than my 150ft neoprene hose by far. Is worth the cost for me; especially not having to continuously correct hose bending and water flow issued caused by it.
customer_reviews.author: Alan  Kook

customer_reviews.title: Easy to maneuver, put away
customer_reviews.text: Love this one. I got it after buying the 50' one for my garage. This will replace 3 heavy 100 ft hoses that I have around the yard in big rollers, as I can just take this and connect it,
customer_reviews.author: Richard Widman

customer_reviews.title: light weight
customer_reviews.text: I used it for several jobs already including with my pressure washer, extended it in connection with another hose, very lightweight. If it holds up one year in the Florida sun it will get 6 stars 🌟
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I have found this product to be much easier to handle than a typical rubber hose. It's lightweight and looks much nicer than all the bulk of a traditional hose. Let's just hope it holds up in the Arizona heat!
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best!!
customer_reviews.text: Hose is very easy and lightweight to use. Company STANDS behind this product. Used it for 4 months and it sprang a leak by the hose bib and the sent me a replacement right away. BY from this AMERICAN companyand you will be rewarded and not disappointed
customer_reviews.author: tz

customer_reviews.title: Very low quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very low quality product, the nozzle not working properly, the hose itself is already warned out in a few weeks. I don't think you can replace it every month for a lifetime. Lifetime warranty is just a sales trick.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: All it claims to be but for questionable durability
customer_reviews.text: This product is all it claims to be but for questionable durability. Previous iterations have shown themselves vulnerable to unexpected wear not in line with the high price. I bought this replacement during a sale, offering a much better price value ratio. We'll see how this one holds up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Christina L Hey

customer_reviews.title: Please return money or replace with new product
customer_reviews.text: Product only lasted 1 1/2 yrs, I barely used it only to clean lawn mower after every cut. When I mostly needed it, the inside hose felt it gave, and water coming out everywhere. I would like my money back, or to resend another hose.
customer_reviews.author: Gaby24

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and compact, good stretch
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Light weight so I can easily handle hose, it shrinks up to fit in very small location, it was fun to watch it shrink! I bought two lengths but only received one warranty card, called the company, they said not to worry, it would be warranted. And no latex odor.
customer_reviews.author: Jozie

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this hose yet, but a friend was helping my elderly parents spray their yard for mosquitoes and used it. He liked it so much he wanted to order one for his yard.
customer_reviews.author: Michele C.

customer_reviews.title: Best hose ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: We own 4 of these hoses. They are easy and durable. They also don’t destroy your plants if they get drug across them and don’t get your hands dirty like some of the industrial black hoses.
customer_reviews.author: Bloveday

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gor my 90 year old mother!
customer_reviews.text: This 100 foot expandable hose is the perfect fit for my 90 year old mother. She was tired of those heavy hoses that kink and cause her trouble when she rewinds them. Her gardens will be watered easily now.thx.
customer_reviews.author: C. Zerull

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing-didn’t even make it through the summer
customer_reviews.text: I loved this hose because it is so lightweight and easy to move around. However, I’ve only had it for a little more than three months and the inner tubing has disconnected from the end of the hose so no water will flow through it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Magnolia

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy, lasted 3 months!
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy!!! This hose worked for 3 months then all of a sudden water starts coming out of the middle of the hose. There are no obvious holes and we only had used the hose to wash the dogs. Has to be thrown away. Complete waste of money!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Inside sleeve broke over and over
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great customer service, great space saver, stretchy and no kink. Cons: inside hose leaked after a few uses then two or so more uses later and it broke. This happened 3-4 times on two different hoses. Maybe we have high water pressure? Either way, we really wanted this to work because they seem so cool, even tried to repair it only to have it later break in another spot.
customer_reviews.author: Rae Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: The hose of my dreams
customer_reviews.text: Full disclosure, I've only had this a short while. So far, it's stellar. Lightweight, sturdy, easy to store and move around. Exactly what I dreamed of in a garden hose!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to use.  I love the 100ft hose can fit in a bucket when not in use.
customer_reviews.text: I really do like the hose very much, but the one year warranty is sad. I can see the outside green fabric is starting to shred. So this has me concerned that the hose won't last a year. I just got the hose last week.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Love this hose and it’s ease of use.
customer_reviews.text: This hose does not kink or restrict water flow at all.it is lightweight and when empty or water it curls up into a flower pot for easy storage. The nozzle is great offering many different types of spray patterns from mist to full. I no longer have to deal with the issues of a regular garden hose so this has certainly made my life easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We use them every day as it's been very hot and not much rain and they work well and roll up nicely and very light. Would recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: carol aruck

customer_reviews.title: More than expected
customer_reviews.text: Just got my hose today and it's more than I expected. Light weight, very flexible and extends longer that it looks like it should. I got he 100' lengh and it's just what i needed.
customer_reviews.author: Carole  Worley

customer_reviews.title: NO WARRANTY SATISFACTION !  DEFECTIVE HOSE & SPRAYER !
customer_reviews.text: GROWGREEN is a scam ! They do not warrant their defective products even with the WARRANTY NUMBER AND WARRANTY QR CODE ! The hose burst in many places after a few months. The sprayer dribbled on every setting from the first use. The only thing it watered was the user !
customer_reviews.author: caq

customer_reviews.title: Light weight.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hose. Light weight and easy to move around. One problem, when the water begins to go through it it looks like a snake slithering through the grass and scared my 3 year old granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Potter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hose
customer_reviews.text: This hose is great, my wife hated the heavy hose we had but uses this one with ease. When you let the pressure off it takes up very little space !!
customer_reviews.author: ALS

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Inner tube came loose and hose is now useless. Trying to figure out how to contact the company for a replacement. Update: three replacements later and the tubes consistently come loose or spring leaks. Don’t waste your money :(
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought this hose for garden club watering projects because it is durable and lightweight, once water is drained out, making it easy to move from place to place. It fits the bill and our volunteers are grateful for the way it has made our work easier!
customer_reviews.author: Pickygirl

customer_reviews.title: Great Lightweight Hose
customer_reviews.text: This hose was recommended as the best expandable hose on the market by Popular Mechanics. On that recommendation I bought one and I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bonita Diemoz

customer_reviews.title: Very Clever (and practical) - Life Time Warranty
customer_reviews.text: It does everything they say it does. Solid (not frail). I bought the 100' hose for my wife and she loves it. She says it also looks nice too!
customer_reviews.author: Robert James

customer_reviews.title: Failed afte 2 1/2 months!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything about this hose until it failed and leaked everywhere 2 1/2 months after purchase. The manufacturer’s warranty was for 30 days! The reason I love Amazon Prime is they gave me credit anyway. Maybe I got a bad hose. I will not buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: freecell God

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Broke and stopped working after 3 months. Water is leaking everywhere, but nothing comes from the top nozzle. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tal Spirer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had been using this product for the past many years. It is sooooooo much easiet to handle and store than my previous rubber hoses that would twist, kink and were heavy. The spray nozzle is great too, especally for reaching far away pots! I'm hoping my resident squirrels are not able to chew through it. Time will tell on that issue.
customer_reviews.author: CJL

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easily maneuverable!!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe how easy this hose is to use and it stretches long enough to reach the back of my yard where I previously needed 25 feet more of bulky, very difficult to wind up hose. Now I just turn it off, spray the water left in it so it shrinks back up and drop it into a large pot. So easy and light, LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.author: Rene Lee

customer_reviews.title: Sprung a leak.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this hose at first, it’s light weight and doesn’t kink. Unfortunately after a little over 1 month just outside of the return window it’s already sprung leaks. I can’t recommend this hose, look elsewhere. Edit: The seller was very helpful and replaced the hose quickly. I’ll update my review if it lasts longer than the first one.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Still good after 1 year of use.
customer_reviews.text: Hose still working well but i unload the pressure each time its used when i am finished. The spray nozzle has already broken.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis K Brown

customer_reviews.title: Squeezes itself dry
customer_reviews.text: This hose is lightweight so it's easy to move; it doesn't knot up. It expands when you turn the water on, and when you turn the water off, you can depress the spray handle and it will continue to water the flowers for probably almost a minute. This way, it's not storing up water which could lead to a mold or freezing situation in colder weather.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Favorite hose.
customer_reviews.text: Actually reaches back of my yard so it truly is 100 foot length. Seeing a bit of fraying so I try to stretch it on grass instead of pathway. Deflated quickly. So easy to handle and use.
customer_reviews.author: Erojam

customer_reviews.title: Leaks after 1 month of use
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these in mid May. Barely a month later one of them has a leak in 3 places!!! We loved it at first! Super disappointed!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Waldron

customer_reviews.title: Stretches and shrinks amazingly!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Lightweight and LOVE how it stretches and shrinks. No kinks and works better than any other kind I have used. Only fault is the spray handle does not shoot out strong enough, although that may just be my water pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Leedy

customer_reviews.title: Great & Green
customer_reviews.text: Good stretch, easy to use, shrinks to a very manageable fit into a small pottery bucket. Nozzle is a great bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Cat in Ohio

customer_reviews.title: GREAT HOSE
customer_reviews.text: I just received this hose over the weekend and have used it only once but so far it is definitely a keeper! I am accustomed to lugging around a 100' rubber hose--compared to that, this is a dream! Light weight, rolls compactly, fittings seem high quality. Provided it holds up over the season, this will be a truly excellent addition to my gardening supplies!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: LIGHT GARDEN HOSE
customer_reviews.text: I used the hose today for the first time, and I love how manageable it is because of its light weight. highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amcd19

customer_reviews.title: Only had it a week.
customer_reviews.text: Only had the hose for a week. So far, it seems to be better quality than others I have purchased. Will update this review in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Fabric needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: I really like how lightweight this hose is, easy to move, however it's extremely upsetting that after 2 uses the fabric is fraying. Update: This hose comes with a 1 year warranty. I contacted grow green brands with the expectation of a remedy, however all I received was an excuse that "all hoses fray over time". After a few uses within a month? Unacceptable! What good is a warranty then?
customer_reviews.author: Valeri Snell

customer_reviews.title: Busted
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE Have to change my review. Hose took a nose dive. Brass end where sprayer attaches sprung a leak. I love it! Blows away regular hoses.
customer_reviews.author: Alina W.

customer_reviews.title: Hose is leaking in multiple spots
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY- my hose is leaking in MULTIPLE SPOTS- i had to toss this after just 3 months of light use.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: easy of use
customer_reviews.text: We love the hose. Have been using it daily for about a week. It is easier to use than our other hoses and it's fun to watch it scrinch up after we turn the water off.
customer_reviews.author: marlene

customer_reviews.title: Light Weight
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this hose. I am completely satisfied. Would recommend to any buyer.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Looper

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: We have a small flower bed that is just less than 100' from the nearest outdoor faucet. We have tried several different hoses over the years, but all proved too heavy or awkward for my wife to easily use. The GrowGreen hose is exactly what we have been looking for and is exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Duncan Lang

customer_reviews.title: Best hose I ever bought
customer_reviews.text: I love this hose, best hose I have ever had! So easy, no hassle, so lightweight you will love it too! Sooo happy to get rid of my old heavy cumbersome hose. Best gift for a gardener!
customer_reviews.author: Succulent Lady TX

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and no kinking
customer_reviews.text: Product as advertised. Especially appreciate the lightweight, small foot print when constricted, and ability to not kink or pinch. Much better than traditional hose. Only negative comment would be that volume/pressure of water delivered is lower from the expandable hose than my traditional rubber garden hose. Unable to determine true durability as is new product with no wear. Over all quite satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Even

customer_reviews.title: Great hose
customer_reviews.text: I love my new hose. It is easy to use, doesn’t kink, and doesn’t have to be coiled.
customer_reviews.author: Pacpal

customer_reviews.title: no kink hose and stores in small space
customer_reviews.text: Only minor problem is emptying hose of water to store hose. This takes a few minutes, depending upon length.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy S

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and very functional
customer_reviews.text: So far, I love this hose. Very light weight and easy to move from area to area. No linking and so easy to wrap up. I am so impressed! Might order a shorter one for my front yard. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: It really is super easy to handle, light, and it is reasonable price for good quality hoses.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Give it a shot!
customer_reviews.text: So far I LOVE this hose. I have had lots that don’t last but so far this one looks very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

product_meta.title: GrowGreen Garden Hose, Expandable Garden Hoses, Water Hose with High Pressure Hose Spray Nozzle, Flexible Garden Hose with All Brass Connectors, Leak Proof, Durable, Heavy Duty Material (100 Feet)
feature_bullets: SPACE EFFICIENT GARDEN HOSE: This amazing water hose starts out very short and expands 3 times its size when it gets under water pressure, but returns in seconds to its original compact length after the water is out!
A GARDEN HOSE DESIGNED TO MAKE LIFE MUCH EASIER: This newly designed expandable garden hose will never tangle, twist, or kink. This Flexible Garden Hose is compact and easy to store away!

HOSE SPRAY NOZZLE INCLUDED: The GrowGreen Garden Hose gets even better with our 8 pattern, high pressure hose spray nozzle! Made with all brass connectors, excellent corrosion resistance and durable quality.

EXPANDABLE GARDEN HOSE WITH HIGH PRESSURE-RESISTANT DURABLE LATEX! Normal operating water pressure 43.5-87PSI/3-6Bar, our new designed water hose can safely operate with water pressure up to 145PSI/10Bar!

GARDEN HOSE COMES WITH A LIFETIME MANUFACTURERS WARRANTY! We are so confident that you will love our garden hoses, but in case you don't, just contact the manufacturer or the seller via Amazon.com for any claims.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,426 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
